p: The results obtained in the study were processes by MS Office Excel v2019 (Microsoft Corporation, Redmond, WA, USA) and Statsoft Statistica v12.5 (Hamburg, Germany) software. The values were expressed as the mean values corrected by standard deviation (SD). Methods of univariate and multivariate statistical analysis (MANOVA, pincipal component analysis (PCA) and correspondence analysis (CA)) were applied for comprehensive evaluation of the relations in the obtained dataset.
